subject: College Athletics
Football
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Penn State and Rutgers will renew their football rivalry in an agreement announced by the universities. The Nittany Lions will travel to Rutgers on Sept. 13, 2014. The Scarlet Knights will visit Beaver Stadium on Sept. 12, 2015. The teams last played in 1995, when Penn State won, 59-34. Penn State leads the series, 22-2. ¶Ken Stabler will not return as the color analyst for Alabama radio broadcasts. Stabler, a former Crimson Tide and N.F.L. quarterback, had been on leave from his duties since his arrest on a drunken-driving charge last June. He was found not guilty by a judge in Robertsdale, Ala. snake.
